name: Dad's Dream
description:
Controls:

  • Movement: Arrow Keys or WASD
  • Interaction: Left Shift

Goal: Deliver dad the items he wants.

Dad enjoying his son bringing him some slippers

This project was made for the Global Game Jam 2019.

THIS GAME WAS MADE IN 8 HOURS. I originally worked on a big adventure game where you played as a blob and whatever you did would determine your path, your home. The idea was overall not interesting so I decided to restart Sunday at 5am local time (UK).
